title: Tools for Generating and Validating Sensor Metadata in SensorML and RDF Formats
text: Purpose: Main entry point workflow. reads Excel file, cleans groups data, checks manufacturer presence Fuseki triple store, triggers generation SensorML XML files. Main operations: - Reads "SensorInfo" sheet filters valid sensor rows. - Groups entries sensor name (system + components). - Checks registers new manufacturers (new_manufacturer sheet). - system: - Validates manufacturer existence check_man_exist(); - Generates UUIDs sensors components; - Produces SensorML files systems components. Output: Creates one folder per system containing XML, TTL, ancillary files.

title: Tools for Generating and Validating Sensor Metadata in SensorML and RDF Formats
text: Purpose: Transforms SensorML XML files (system components) RDF/Turtle format according SOSA/SSN PROV ontologies, aligning PIDINST DataCite metadata model. final step enables integration sensor metadata triple store Apache Jena Fuseki. Main operations: - Reads SensorML XML structure system/ components/ folders. - Extracts key metadata (identifier, description, observed properties, capabilities). - Maps SensorML elements RDF triples following SOSA, SSN, FOAF, PROV, Schema.org vocabularies. - Creates one TTL files system_components_files_ttl/ folder. - Optionally prepares data upload Fuseki triple store. Output: Generates RDF/Turtle files describing systems components, stored : Sensors_files_system_/system_components_files_ttl/

title: Tools for Generating and Validating Sensor Metadata in SensorML and RDF Formats
text: Purpose: Creates RDF/Turtle file describing specific sensor instance based existing sensor type URI. function complements sensors_type_rdf() representing real, deployed sensors instantiate previously defined sensor types. supports provenance, creator information (via ORCID), contact details compliant FAIR PIDINST practices. Main operation: - Generates unique identifier (UUID) sensor instance. - Links instance corresponding sensor type (rdf:type). - Adds provenance metadata (prov:Entity), creation date (dct:created), creator (dct:creator). - Creates contact point block (dcat:contactPoint) foaf:Person information (name, surname, ORCID). - Exports clean RDF/Turtle file prefixes SOSA, SSN, PROV, FOAF, DCAT, DCT. - Automatically validates output TTL file syntax presence required predicates via sensors_validate_ttl(). Output: single RDF/Turtle file named using pattern: sensor_instance_YYYYMMDD_<UUID>.ttl

title: Tools for Generating and Validating Sensor Metadata in SensorML and RDF Formats
text: SensorML XML files produced workflow can transformed RDF/Turtle using sensorML_type_rdf() function (SPARQL-Generate based). step enriches metadata following SOSA/SSN ontologies prepares publication Fuseki triple store, triples can queried linked FAIR resources. Example usage: sensors_type_rdf(files_path = "sensorML_files_system_<UUID>/")
